files.description: Provides a CLI to initialize a starter corpus, create/edit claim+annotation templates, validate JSONL files, and export a compact dataset slice.
Contains the curated reference documents/passages with stable IDs and citation metadata used for grounding claim labels.

SUMMARY: Wrote a small curated JSONL reference corpus with stable IDs and citation metadata to ground supported/contradicted/insufficient claim labels.

files.description: Contains the initial borderline-confidence dataset slice with atomic claims, labels, and explicit provenance pointers into the reference corpus.
Tests schema/rubric/gold validators on known-good and known-bad examples to ensure labeling and provenance rules are enforced.

missionDescription: Define an atomic-claim schema + labeling rubric (supported/contradicted/insufficient) and build a small curated reference corpus + gold annotations to serve as the first 'borderline-confidence' dataset slice.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Provides a defensible evaluation and product stance for the 'borderline band' by shifting decisions to claim-level verification over a curated corpus, enabling tiered risk labeling and better measurem...
